title: 113_s1841
content: Exemption from sequestration for fiscal year 2014. Exemption from sequestration for fiscal year 2014: Amendment to Section 251A(5) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to modify defense function reductions for discretionary appropriations and direct spending accounts within function 050. For fiscal year 2015, OMB will reduce discretionary appropriations and direct spending by $15 billion, without implementing reductions for accounts allocated under paragraph (4). For fiscal years 2016, 2017, and 2018, OMB will increase reductions to discretionary appropriations and direct spending by $2 billion, $9 billion, and $9 billion respectively, totaling $30 billion in spending cuts. For fiscal years 2019, 2020, and 2021, OMB will increase spending cuts by $12 billion, $15 billion, and an unspecified amount respectively. For fiscal years 2014 through 2021, OMB will calculate reductions to discretionary appropriations and direct spending, with adjustments made according to specific subparagraphs. The Office of Management and Budget will issue a revised sequestration preview report for fiscal year 2014, and the President will issue a revised sequestration order for direct spending budgetary reductions. The Office of Management and Budget will issue a revised sequestration preview report for fiscal year 2014, and the President will issue a revised sequestration order for direct spending budgetary reductions pursuant to section 251A(8) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
